mentions.candidate: Bill Wright was born and educated in Dumfries. He started work as an apprentice electrician before changing to a career as an instrument technician. He worked with various international companies in the North Sea, Syria, Oman, Turkey and Azerbaijan, following retirement.

issues.brexitEurope: outside of the EU’s restrictive practices and regulations.

images.caption: Our Scottish Team - Bill Wright for South Scotland along with other candidates for various regions

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions Bill Wright's local involvement by stating, 'In your community Bill believes UKIP is the Straight Talking, Common Sense Party that can change Scotland and the UK for the better once we are outside of the EU’s restrictive practices and regulations.'
